content.raw: I tried putting atlas in parts of the terrain (vrc_task_2) where the height is non zero but `fromEntity->GetCollisionBoundingBox().min.z` is  returning 0. Same for `max.z`.  Also I think `GetCollisionBoundingBox()` may not be the right function to use as it won't provide the height of the terrain at a specific point.
